commands.name: Forward
commands.desc: Moves the turtle forward, in the direction that it's facing, by the specified distance (measured in turtle steps).

commands.name: Backward
commands.desc: Moves the turtle backward, i.e., exactly opposite to the direction that it's facing, by the specified distance (measured in turtle steps).

commands.name: Left
commands.desc: Turns the turtle counterclockwise by the specified angle, measured in degrees.

commands.name: Right
commands.desc: Turns the turtle clockwise by the specified angle, measured in degrees.

commands.name: Comment
commands.desc: Delimits a portion of text that will be ignored during the code's execution. This may be useful to include an explanation about what a part of the code does or to temporarily disable a chunk of code.

commands.name: Color
commands.desc: Sets the turtle's pen color to the one specified (expects a CSS color).

commands.name: Background Color
commands.desc: Sets the background color to the one specified (expects a CSS color).

commands.name: Show Turtle
commands.desc: Makes the turtle visible on screen.

commands.name: Hide Turtle
commands.desc: Makes the turtle invisible on screen.

commands.name: Pen Up
commands.desc: Sets the pen's position to UP, meaning it will no longer draw any lines.

commands.name: Pen Down
commands.desc: Sets the pen's position to DOWN, meaning it will draw lines when the turtle changes position.

commands.name: Pen Size
commands.desc: Sets the turtle's pen size to the specified number. This number has to be higher or equal to 1.

commands.name: Repeat
commands.desc: Repeats a certain instruction list (number) times. (Can be nested)

commands.name: Home
commands.desc: Moves the turtle back to the center of the screen.

commands.name: Set X
commands.desc: Sets the X coordinate of the turtle to the one specified.

commands.name: Set Y
commands.desc: Sets the Y coordinate of the turtle to the one specified.

commands.name: Set X Y
commands.desc: Sets the coordinates of the turtle to the ones specified.

commands.name: Set Heading
commands.desc: Sets the heading of the turtle to the angle specified, measured in degrees.

commands.name: Clear Screen
commands.desc: Clears the entire screen and resets the turtle's values.
